    • mouseMoved

      public void mouseMoved(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 mousePos, int quadrant)
      Calculates the weapon rotation based on the mouse distance from the center of the screen. Calculation is completed in the form of a factor value which is multiplied by the maximum weapon tilt. Additionally, calculates offset values for the attachments on the weapon.
      Parameters:
      mousePos - The mouse position relative to the UI Stage, meaning 0,0 is the bottom left coordinate.
      quadrant - The quadrant of the screen the mouse is in, returned by the UIScreen getMouseQuadrant API.
      See Also:
      • UIScreen.getMouseQuadrant(Vector2)

      @Null public ProjectileEntity[] shoot()
